name: Aquaduct (Dikkop)
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 42: Running out of space.

The world is burning and your only hope is to build an aquaduct in time!

Build tiles to connect the aquaduct to the mountains.

Controls:
WASD or hold middleMouse to rotate around planet 

Leftclick To place an aquaduct tile (Only Next To Another Aquaduct tile) 

Rightclick to rotate aquaduct tile
Scroll to zoom in/ zoom out

Lightning clouds are evil and create fire!
Rain clouds put fire out, they spawn when you reach a mountain.

Can you connect all 12 mountains and witness the epic ending?

Music by: http://www.jellevanaanholt.nl/
